official_title: Relating to the extension of duty-free treatment for certain digital processing units.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1991, duty-free treatment of certain digital processing units.

titles.title: Relating to the extension of duty-free treatment for certain digital processing units.
